name: The Lion King
details: A classic Disney animated film about a young lion cub named Simba who learns valuable life lessons as he grows to become king of the Pride Lands.

name: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse
details: A popular Disney animated show featuring Mickey Mouse and his friends as they solve various problems using fun and interactive tools.

name: Stranger Things
details: A thrilling science fiction-horror series that follows a group of kids in the 1980s as they encounter supernatural forces and government conspiracies.

name: The Crown
details: A historical drama series that traces the reign of Queen Elizabeth II and the major events of the 20th century in the United Kingdom.

name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
details: The first film in the Harry Potter series, following the young wizard Harry as he discovers his magical heritage and begins his journey at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

name: Friends
details: A beloved sitcom that revolves around a group of six friends living in New York City as they navigate through life, love, and friendship.

name: Breaking Bad
details: A critically acclaimed crime drama series that tells the story of a high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine kingpin, Walter White.

name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
details: The latest Spider-Man film where Peter Parker seeks the help of Doctor Strange to erase his identity as Spider-Man, leading to a multiverse of possibilities.

name: Avatar
details: James Cameron's groundbreaking science fiction film set on the alien planet of Pandora, featuring the Na'vi and humans.

name: The Simpsons
details: A long-running animated sitcom featuring the misadventures of the Simpson family in the fictional town of Springfield.
